Einstein Article Recommendations 
Einstein Bots 
Plan Your Einstein Bot 
Get Started with Einstein Bots 
Create an Einstein Bot 

Use a Dialog Question Step 
To build and manage Einstein Bots, the following permissions are required: Customize Application, Modify Metadata, or Manage Bots.

Question steps allow bots to ask customers questions, receive data from customers, and inform the bot about what action to take next. They come in two types of input from the customer: choices (static or dynamic) or text.

Choices provide the customer with a set of options. Text allows customers to enter unstructured data and allows the bot to act on it.

Set Up a Dialog Question Element with Choice Responses 
Set Up a Dialog Question Step with Dynamic Choice Responses 
Set Up a Dialog Question Step with Text Responses 

What's an Entity? What's a Variable? Bots can act on this information through dialog action steps, or through dialog rule steps.
title: Service Cloud Einstein Bots Conversation Design
